comments.body:
Probably you already have that, but just to say it:
Is there a ticket so this doesn't get lost?

Obviously doesn't affect the readiness for merging.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +41,45 @@# TODO: RRootDS is in the process of being hidden from users, and it's currently deprecated.
# Re-enable these tests after moving RRootDS to the internal namespace
# ROOT_ADD_GTEST(datasource_root datasource_root.cxx LIBRARIES ROOTDataFrame)
ROOT_ADD_GTEST(datasource_trivial datasource_trivial.cxx LIBRARIES ROOTDataFrame)

comments.body: should the flags be restored to the original values afterwards? if not, should the flags be overridden at the project level?

> should the flags be restored to the original values afterwards?

Well, yes, if it is possible. I have no experience. Let me try...

@eguiraud  you mean something like this:
```cmake
if (MSVC)
  # TODO: remove this workaround for MS compiler bug #1441527 once fixed
  string(REPLACE "-Od -Z7" "-O2" CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG}")
  string(REPLACE "-Z7" "" CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO}")
endif()
ROOT_ADD_GTEST(datasource_more datasource_more.cxx LIBRARIES ROOTDataFrame)
if (MSVC)
  # restore the compiler flags
  string(REPLACE "-O2" "-Od -Z7" CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG}")
  set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO} -Z7")
endif()
```
I guess so :smile: otherwise half the ROOT project will be built with different flags. what do you think?
Doesn't work. Still working on it
You should be able to use [`set_source_files_properties`](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/latest/command/set_source_files_properties.html)?
